channel.title: ~-`~Ruinous~'-~ 24\7 VPS HOSTED | TORVA AND CHAOTICS | CURSES | DICING
channel.description:
Hello fellow MoparScape Users!
Come check out http://ruinousrs.com/ for a great new server that has anything you can think of.
Some things are: [ul][li]Dicing[/li] [li]PK'ing[/li] [li]Skilling[/li] [li]PvM'ing[/li][/ul]
And [i]much[/i] more!
Sorry about the lack of screenshots. Just come check us out! You won't regret it!
[img]http://gyazo.com/54c6ba74175a02dfc58f87bd0e3e5b37[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/1728f2f25bd83f7da0e9b5418d43596d[/img]
~Mod Sam and the Ruinous Development Team~
Play now @ : [url=http://www.ruinousrs.com]http://www.ruinousrs.com[/url]

item.title: ~-`~Ruinous~'-~ 24\7 VPS HOSTED | TORVA AND CHAOTICS | CURSES | DICING
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“Samman629, post:5, topic:542464”][quote author=portugalrox link=topic=661342.msg4420707#msg4420707 date=1398219962]

It was made using the newest edition of Java. Please download it. If it is being blocked you must change you’re java security settings and allow self-signed clients to run!

I downloaded the lastest java 2 days ago v 8.1 and my java security is on medium. or the lowest"
[/quote] what does it say? It should work. Close all tabs and rerun. Works for the other players :([/quote]
It worked the first time I tried thanks

:edit it worked for awhile in your Java panel add these exceptions
http://www.ruinousrs.com/play-now.html
And
http://www.rspscodingloaders.com/loaders/insidiax.jar

Read full topic
